action.action-desc: Mr. Ruiz introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce, and in addition to the Committees on Oversight and Government Reform, and House Administration, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

form.official-title: To amend the Family and Medical Leave Act of 1993 and title 5, United States Code, to permit leave to care for an adult child, grandchild, or grandparent who has a serious health condition, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Grandparent-Grandchild Medical Leave Act.

paragraph.text: Section 101 of the Family and Medical Leave Act of 1993 (29 U.S.C. 2611) is amended by adding at the end the following:
The term grandchild means the son or daughter of an employee’s son or daughter.
The term grandparent means a parent of a parent of an employee.
Section 101(12) of such Act (29 U.S.C. 2611(12)) is amended, by striking who is— and all that follows and inserting and includes an adult child.
